subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|military}} [[brigade]]
# {{†}} [[army]]; [[troops]]
# {{†}} an army consisting of 500 [[soldiers]]
# {{†}} [[traveller]]
# [[journey]]; [[trip]]
# {{†}} [[hotel]]
# to [[travel]]
# 56th [[hexagram]] of the [[I Ching]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: * {{sense|military}} Under the [[w:National Revolutionary Army|National Revolutionary Army]], a brigade was composed of two [[regiment]]s ({{zh-l|*團}}). In turn, two brigades formed a [[division]] ({{zh-l|*整編師}}), a [[square division]].
